pullrequest.title: Upload brew bottles to non versioned destination in S3

content.raw:
I think this doesn't fix the problem. I think the upload destination is set by the `S3_UPLOAD_PATH` parameter to the repository uploader job, not in the repository_uploader script:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/repository_uploader_ng/1916/parameters/
content.html:
I think this doesn't fix the problem. I think the upload destination is set by the S3_UPLOAD_PATH parameter to the repository uploader job, not in the repository_uploader script:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/repository_uploader_ng/1916/parameters/
